title: Orientation: The CQE Spine Live
props: ['Room', 'One table, 8 colored pens, tape wall for overlays.', 'Paper kit', 'Octet sheet, DNA■10, 4■bit sticker, ledger page.', 'Instruments', 'None (paper■only).', 'Safety', 'N/A']
blocking: ['■■ Pick a tiny question (≤1 min).', '■■ Mark 8 views (colored boxes), set a palindromic REST.', '■■ Run a forward↔inverse mirror; circle mismatches (red).', '■■ Write a Δ■lift (local identity) to fix one mismatch; re■mirror.', '■■ Tighten one metric (strict ratchet), shade a 4■bit receipt; log ledger.', 'Ledger hook (what gets recorded)', '— form_id, octet map, mirror tolerance, Δ■lift note, strict threshold, 4■bit.', 'Hand■ins (artifacts to keep)', '✓ Filled octet, mirror ticks, Δ■lift card, 4■bit stickered ledger row.']
debrief: ['■ Which view dominated debt?', '■ Was the Δ■lift local and monotone?', '■ Would a different mirror have failed?']

title: n=1→n=5: The Hinge that Forces the Octad
props: ['Room', 'Grid board (4×4), parity markers.', 'Paper kit', 'n=1→4 worksheets, insertion checklist, class bins (8).', 'Instruments', 'Safety', 'N/A']
blocking: ['■■ Build n=1 rest, show first parity choice at n=2.', '■■ Complete n=3, point to latent 4■cell cross.', '■■ Canonicalize n=4 palindrome (up to pose).', '■■ Enumerate 16 insertion tests for ‘5’; bucket into 8 legal classes; note 1 palindromic + 7 invariant.', 'Ledger hook (what gets recorded)', '— Octad class tag, pose, tolerance; 4■bit commit when 4 views pass.', 'Hand■ins (artifacts to keep)', '✓ Checked grid, class map (8), receipt.']
debrief: ['■ What would ‘<8 classes’ break downstream?', '■ How does rotation act on class labels?']

title: Mirror & Δ■Lift Clinic (Bug■to■Fix)
props: ['Room', 'Whiteboard, printed spectra pair or time series twin.', 'Paper kit', 'Instruments', 'Safety', 'N/A']
blocking: ['■■ Pick the forward pipeline; write its inverse.', '■■ Run both; mark delta windows; choose one Δ■lift from the cookbook; re■run mirror; record debt drop.', 'Ledger hook (what gets recorded)', '— Mirror tolerance, Δ■lift id, before/after OPE/FCE, strict update.', 'Hand■ins (artifacts to keep)', '✓ Before/after overlay with red fix marks, 4■bit row.']
